title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
plot: The origin story of renegade warrior Furiosa before her encounter and teamup with Mad Max.

7869068 7871605 The ones who yell the least tend

7874040 7875274 Despite everything

7891224 7894060 My own family.

7896663 7898632 I'm right there,
I'm right there with you.

7910977 7912445 If the shooter goes

7913547 7916015 the precise moment

7917751 7920319 Minor torture,

7921555 7923690 will turn my brain

7923724 7925526 I won't even hear
the sound of the gun.

7928428 7929696 I'll hear it for the rest

7931063 7932633 I'll feel the kickback

7937704 7939972 As the slug worms its way

7940006 7941575 into the soft matter

7941608 7943610 taking with it what you call

7947180 7949583 from which my mother

7951518 7953352 I'll be dead and you'll

7953386 7955988 your lovey-dovey and

7957791 7960159 You can never balance

7968100 7970403 What you want, dear,

7972238 7974440 And if I could give you that,

7974474 7976677 But I don't fear
the loss of bliss in Heaven.

7979245 7981214 And I've got a fiendishly high

7989188 7991792 If you
can't do me quick,
7991825 7993326 you'll have to do me slow.

7995094 7998765 But you are never going to get

8063564 8066332 I have been waiting for you.

8066365 8069201 I've been waiting
for someone like you,

8072839 8076843 No honor, no rule of law

8076877 8080246 Just two evil bastards

8081615 8085217 You do this, you do this right,

8085251 8087754 -I am nothing like you.
-You are me.

8089723 8091792 To feel alive,
we seek sensation.

8091825 8095428 Any sensation to wash away
the cranky black sorrow.

8096530 8099298 And it leaves us for a moment,
but then it comes back,
8099332 8100634 and we have to do it all again.

8102335 8104871 and each time we need more
until too much is never enough.

8104905 8108474 We are the already dead,
Little D.

8127961 8130764 ...do you have it in you
to make it epic?
8152451 8155689 and they spent the rest of the day in silence.
8165398 8170169 They claim that she ended him in ways more fitting.
8181548 8186687 But this is the truth whispered to me by Furiosa herself.
8212646 8216482 It was an echo growing out of a living being.
8225959 8227828 but it's not for you and me.
8229295 8232766 Each of us in our own way will vanish from this Earth.
8235635 8238672 ...some uncorrupted life will rise to adorn it.
